snippet.title: HANA : Hide and seek - Official Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Hello I am working on HANA a horror RPGmaker Game.

PLAY GAME https://catowo.itch.io/hana
so far only chapter 1 is out!

You move into the city, away from your family. Luckily you find a cheap goshiwon. Although, the day you move in weird things started to happen. You keep seeing this woman... A woman with long black hair covering her face, scrawny body, with long deformed limbs. And the more you fear it, the stronger it gets. And it won't stop until you're dead...

will you survive? 

#HANA #RPGgame #PixelGame #HorrorGame

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP ME

Patreon : monthly subscription and see the bts of making the game and other art I post there

https://www.patreon.com/haesaa

ko-fi : one time donation

https://ko-fi.com/haesaa
